channel.title: How do u make legs a .dat?
channel.description: in datmaker V1 i has put my legs i made... for my server but when i animate it and convert to .dat it removed the animation data and puts it to all PRI:1 and all wight value to 0 how do i convert it to .dat myself? without lossing animation data?

item.title: How do u make legs a .dat?
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

can you post the legs and ill animate it for you and keep it in a file that meta can use so you can see what i did?

Read full topic

item.source: How do u make legs a .dat?

item.title: How do u make legs a .dat?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Ah ok, i see now, sorry.

It won’t make them invisible, if you read this very carefully.

OPEN the masterpalette.mqo file [u]first[/u], then insert the other models which you have, and do not delete any materials.

You must do it in the correct order or else, yes, it will turn them invisible.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make legs a .dat?

item.title: How do u make legs a .dat?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

but if i dont delete all unused it makes them invisble…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2009, 03:34:15 pm[/size][hr]+ also the legs are all red… the PRI: is red… look at PRI: the multicolour is the VSKIn or TSKIn “cant remember”

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make legs a .dat?

item.title: How do u make legs a .dat?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Yeahh, uh, you’ve done it completely wrong.
The legs are the worst, why are all 4 objects all red?
Follow my tutorial on legs animation then try again…

And also, [b]do not delete the unused materials after you’ve finished animating, you need all 255 (?), not sure if it’s 255, but yeah, don’t delete any of them, that’s probably why they’re losing their animation data.

Read full topic
